name: Mario & Sonic at the PyeongChang 2018 Olympic Winter Games
name_original: Mario & Sonic at the PyeongChang 2018 Olympic Winter Games
description:
Almost a year in the making, the final release of the first Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games fangame is here!
Play 20 different dream events as either Mario or Sonic in familiar places of both universes!
Press F1 on the menu to see the credits and shift to return to said menu.
Enjoy a behind-the-scene slideshow as extras, try to get the gold in every event and have fun!!
